thread.title: BRIEF-La Jolla Pharmaceutical Announces Pricing Of Public Offering Of Common Stock

title: BRIEF-La Jolla Pharmaceutical Announces Pricing Of Public Offering Of Common Stock

organizations.name: brief-la jolla pharmaceutical announces pricing of public offering of common stock
common stock reuters staff   la jolla pharmaceutical co

text: 25 PM / Updated 20 minutes ago BRIEF-La Jolla Pharmaceutical Announces Pricing Of Public Offering Of Common Stock Reuters Staff   La Jolla Pharmaceutical Co: * MPANY ANNOUNCES PRICING OF PUBLIC OFFERING OF COMMON STOCK * SAYS PUBLIC OFFERING OF 3.40 MILLION COMMON SHARES PRICED AT $29.50PER SHARE * SAYS PUBLIC OFFERING OF 3.40 MILLION COMMON SHARES PRICED AT $29.50PER SHARE Source text for Eikon:
